node.address: carrera 4a 1-100 San Antonio, Diagonal al Hotel Intercontinental , Cali, Colombia

content.value:
The guest house is 900 meters from Saint's Peter Cathedral, 1.1 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater and 1.2 km from La Ermita Church. Farfan Airport is 79 km away.

Each room here will provide you with a seating area. There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Extras include a washing machine, an outdoor seating area and a fan.

Each room here will provide you with a seating area. There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Extras include a washing machine, an outdoor seating area and a fan.

At Hostal Pájara Pinta you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a bar with special activities each weekend. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and laundry facilities.
The guest house is 900 m from Saint's Peter Cathedral, 1.1 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater and 1.2 km from La Ermita Church.
Alfonso Bonilla Aragon International Airport can be reached after a 45-minute drive.

description.description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Hostal Pájara Pinta is located in Cali. Free WiFi access is available. At Hostal Pájara Pinta you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and laundry facilities.
